data.title: Food and Drink
data.meta_description: Options for eating and drinking at the Getty Villa, from lunch to afternoon tea with a view.
data.text:
Menu

The menu changes based on season and availability of ingredients in the Villa Herb Garden. Items include tea, baked goods such as scones, tea breads, and tea sandwiches, and desserts.

Current Menu

A Basket of House-Baked Scones and Tea Breads

Freshly brewed tea and traditional accompaniments

Smoked King Trumpet Mushroom Sandwich

Avocado on sourdough

Salmon Mousse

Smoked salmon, cream cheese, lemon juice, pickled radish, parsley, chives, and dill on crispy potato

House Roasted Turkey Tarragon Salad with Cuyama Orchards Apple

on mini croissant

Cucumber and Carrot with Vegan Chive Cream Cheese

Vegan chive cheese and lemon zest on wheat bread

Creminelli Sopressata and Brie

House made pear jam on brioche

Grilled Vegetable Panini

Herb hummus, zucchini and peppers on gluten-free toast

Desserts

Mrs. Garrette's Carrot Cake

Sea Salt Caramel French Macaron

Strawberry Tea Pastry

Black Forest Tartlets: Chocolateâ€“Amarena Cherry

What does the per person cost include?

The per person cost includes food and tea. It does not include additional beverages (i.e. assorted sodas, coffee, decaf coffee, wine, beer, juices, milk), service charge, and tax, which are charged separately. It also does not include the cost of parking.

If I have a reservation for tea, do I also need to make a reservation for admission?

No. Your reservation for Garden Tea also serves as your reservation for admission to the museum.

Can I make a reservation for a large group?

Due to high demand, the Garden Tea at the Villa can accommodate parties of up to 8 people. For information about reserving the Founder's Room, please call the Getty Events team at (310) 440-6900 ext. 7373.

How much does parking cost?

Parking is $25 per car or motorcycle. Learn more about parking and transportation.

I have food allergies. What can I eat at Garden Tea?

We can accommodate some food allergies, but not all. Please inform us of any food allergies when you make your reservation. Requests must be made at least 48 hours before a reservation and are subject to chef's choice.

Can I bring children?

Yes. We have a special menu for children under 8 years old, which includes hot chocolate, sandwiches, and dessert.

How much does Garden Tea cost for children?

$50 plus sales tax and service charge.
